citations.narrative:
There are still 8 dogs in outside enclosures with Igloo dog houses. These dogs are 4 juvenile collies with id's 8346, 8348,
8345,8343, 1 Rottweiler with id 2037, and 3 labrador retrievers with id 8352, 3436, and 8358. There is still no wind and
rain break in the front of the entrance to the Igloo dog houses.
Outdoor facilities for dogs must include one or more shelter structures with a wind break and rain break at the entrance.
A wind break must be added to the front of these enclosures to protect the animals from rain and wind. Wind and rain
breaks are necessary to keep the animals warm and dry and to prevent discomfort.

The 2 water receptacles for 3 adult labrador retrievers with id 8352, 3436, and 8358 have floating a green, brown
substance and it is difficult to see the bottom of the water receptacle.
Water receptacles must be kept clean and sanitized in accordance with § 3.11(b).
Clean the water receptacles as often as necessary to prevent organic buildup. Water and water receptacles must be
clean and potable to the animals contained in the enclosure to prevent dehydration and disease.
To be corrected by end of business June 30, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section
